Module scheduling_app.mattmullinsc195
Package Controllers

Class UpdateAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.UpdateAppointmentController
public class UpdateAppointmentController extends Object
This class is the controller for the Update Appointment screen. It handles the updating of appointment information.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method is used to initialize the screen. It populates the combo boxes and fields with the information from the selected appointment.

    • updateButtonAction

      public void updateButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is used to update the appointment information in the database. It contains the exception handling for the update appointment functionality. It contains all the logic for the update appointment functionality.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • cancelButtonAction

      public void cancelButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method cancels the update appointment process and returns to the main screen. No changes are made to the appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
